bio: ACME Universe is a popular IT company around many countries working in diverse fields. ACME Universe services are used by many companies, educational and government organizations around the world. Known for perfection, high usability and enterprise level features, our teams deliver high quality services with no analog on the market. Today ACME Universe services are used by many Fortune 500 companies and other clients having thousands of their users and clients worldwide. At ACMEUNIVERSE our mission is simple – to help visualize your ideas and bring your business to success. Our company mission reflects our focus on achieving this goal. We actively partner with our clients in our research and development efforts. It is our belief that each organization is defined by its values. At ACMEUNIVERSE we share the following core values, which are reflected in our daily attention to our customers and products. We closely follow the professional development trends and best practices. We pay attention to detail and strive for perfection in every feature we deliver. We use state-of-the-art technologies and infrastructure to make our workflow advanced and maintain high-quality output.

Our Commitment
“Never falling short to customers’ expectation.” We believe in this and making sure to meet this
commitment.
Technical Overview
We got exciting fusion of few experienced heads over young, enthusiastic minds and this
combinations sets their own goals to make sure we are leaving no stone unturned to give our
customer most advance solutions that fits their needs. Expertise of various platforms of our
team works on all needed technologies.

abstrac: Smart Social Media & Lead Generation for B2B Firms
bio:
After 15 years working in corporate land for a range of software companies, I set up a niche lead generation firm called Sales Factory in 2003.

Wow the last decade has been a steep learning curve - defining the right sales process, perfecting the skill transfer techniques that turn ordinary business developers into superstars, understanding the strengths and weaknesses of multiple B2B lead generation methods and how to integrate techniques to optimise sales results.

Many lessons learnt in order to reach a point where my company has the competency and IP required to enable clients to experience a step-change improvement to their lead generation results.

This capability was used to create our Sales Accelerator Managed Service. Sales Accelerator is now being used by a rapidly growing base of forward thinking customers who want to address one, some or all of the challenges below:

Normally provide my services on a money-back-guaranteed basis

Projects currently running in the United States, UK, Continental Europe and Russia

bio: At Intrepid Software Solutions, our highly skilled staff partners with businesses from the independent entrepreneur to global companies to implement improvements, and solve problems to make their business efficient, productive and more marketable. Every business owner and manager strives to grow their company to be the best in their industry. We help our customers reach these goals by finding efficiencies and improvements through the utilization of proven software and technologies.   We assist the small business with internet marketing, website design, and software applications, and scale up to enterprise software deployment, development, integration, support and training.   Our project management process ensures clear communication so our clients know what they are getting every step of the way, leading up to delivery.

We operate in the USA and will not outsource to any company outside the USA.Hourly, T&M, or fixed price agreements are accepted.In general, payment is expected 30 days after the invoice date.  Other payment agreements may be negotiated.All work is covered under a 60 day warranty.

bio:
Professionally I have been involved in numerous Microsoft, VMware, and storage migrations and have used my skill sets to automate various IT tasks to make my customers much more efficient in what they do as a business. 

I pride myself in being able to complete very rigorous IT tasks remotely saving my customers both time and money.

I've never found a project that could not be completed or a problem to hard to solve. 

If you choose me as your IT engineer you can be certain you'll receive the utmost "white glove" treatment as well as have your projects meet all provided deadlines.

Hours: 24/7 Whatever it takes to get a project completed
Payment: PayPal, MoneyOrder, Check, and all Credit Cards
Communication (in order of preference): Email and Phone
